fields.name: Capacity
fields.description: A value indicating the total capacity of appliance resource.

fields.name: ProcessUtilization
fields.description: A value indicating the utilization percentage by gateway agent on appliance.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: A value indicating the status of appliance resource.

fields.name: TotalUtilization
fields.description: A value indicating the total utilization percentage for all processes on the appliance.
